value.name: Q&A: Abdoulaye Thiam on committing to Gophers basketball program
value.description: KSTP Sports caught up with Gophers men's basketball commitment Abdoulaye Thiam. The Orlando native played most recently for Indian River State College, a Junior College powerhouse. They qualified ...

value.name: JUCO Transfer Abdoulaye Thiam Commits To Minnesota
value.description: Earlier this week, the Minnesota Golden Gophers got some exciting news as key JUCO transfer Abdoulaye Thiam announced he would be committing to the program. He joins what is starting to become an interesting roster for new head coach Ben Johnson.

value.name: Body camera video released in 2019 Memphis police shooting the DA says was justified
value.description: The police check the house and don't find anyone ... Andre Horton, Martavious Banks, Abdoulaye Thiam,James Lee Kirkwood, David Hoal and now Smith. Eighteen were fatal shootings.
